information.role: Developed with MarCom Group: creative directors Curtis Nelson & Bryan Clark, designers Carolyn Belefski, Soon Ham, & Jerel Motos, senior developer Matthew Brackney
information.description: The main site features heavy HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript Interactivity for tablets and desktops, including sound, video, animation, and games. Interactive elements are optimized for different platforms and support IE8+. The mobile version features CSS3 transitions, list navigations, and a drill-down IA.
information.mediaDetail: JavaScript animation using greensock.js, HTML5 video with IE support using video.js, HTML5 sound with IE support using soundmanager2.js, responsive layouts without a visual grid, IE support using css3-mediaqueries.js, custom scrollbars, cookies, JavaScript mobile detection.
